title: So my friend got 20 minute wait time for going AFK, he actually crashed.
body:
So first of all I'm sorry if I don't have all the details, but my friend and I went duo queue in a normal draft pick and his game crashed during loading screen. His last five minute wait time was also for crashing, but he just waited it out. Once again, he crashed during loading screen. We weren't even in a ranked either! I think he rage quit the game... Haven't seen him on since then actually.

So I was just wondering if this is a justified wait time or a mistake. If it is something that is non revokable that's okay. Just wondering lol {{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body:
if he has left multiple games recently
it's deserved

and how is riot's system supposed to know if someone crashed or left
All the games he's left have been crashed games, as have mine and everyone I play with

If your friend is crashing frequently, you should have them run the hextech repair tool. Something is obviously wrong with their install or computer if they are constantly crashing.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

Leaverbuster is intended to be both a penalty and a forcing function to get people to fix issues they may have before it impacts the game of them/others.
Thank you! Thats a lot of help :} Ill get him to try it out. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=DeracadaVenom,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bAtbXIOZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-10-24T17:34:33.105+0000)
>
> All the games he's left have been crashed games, as have mine and everyone I play with

So Technically it's deserved because he has left multiple of games
Riot's leaver buster bot etc can't detect if it's an intentional leave or a crash

I'd recommend him to contact support etc and try to find out why he keeps crashing
Tell your friend to send a support ticket.

I'll try if I can find him :\ already suggested it and he didn't answer... TBH he can leave if he wants to, as he has been playing for 3 years now. But it just kinda makes me sad you know

And he's our best jungler so you know I don't want another autofilled teemo jungle

Regardless of whether your machine crashed or you just decided to leave, the experience for your team is the same. If you have a computer that is so unreliable that it crashes often enough (and takes long enough to boot back up) to give you penalties, you probably shouldn't be playing the game. Sucks but what can you do?
Coming back on this for no reason lol, I haven’t seen him since! I’m actually kind of disappointed... we never got a chance to go death blossom jungle!
the system can't tell the difference.  whether the computer crashed or he left it dont matter. the system sees it as leaving and therefore nailing him.
